name: Team Performing
context: It is your first month of working remotely with the medium.com dev team. You are faced with numerous opportunities to interact with your remote non-Andelan and local Andelan team mates. This pushes you into numerous scenarios where you have to give and receive feedback.
tasks: Give feedback to a local dev on pulling their weight. GO FOR IT!
Respond to feedback given by a local dev on pulling your weight. GO FOR IT!
Give feedback to a remote dev on their rubbish pull requests. GO FOR IT!
Respond to feedback from a remote dev on your rubbish pull requests. GO FOR IT!
Give feedback to the TTL on unclear communication and its impact. GO FOR IT!
Respond to feedback from the TTL on unclear communication and its impact. GO FOR IT!
Give feedback to the CTO on innapropriate comments to certain members of the team. GO FOR IT!
Respond to feedback from the the CTO on the innapropriate comments to certain members of the team. GO FOR IT!
Give feedback to a local dev on being selfish and not supporting other team members. GO FOR IT!
Respond to feedback from a local dev on being selfish and not supporting other team members. GO FOR IT!
